author: usmans.info
content: Hello all, this is Uzi here. Also from PegaSys (Brisbane, Australia) and working on Teku implementing eip-2335 keystore specification at the moment.

author: 0x6e69636f
content: Hi everyone, Nicolas, Pegasys DocOps and support engineer. Working on our doc system and enterprise support. Mainly worked on ETH1, but our ETH2 client documentation is our next priority.
